Renee

Renee Romero

Renee Romero is an Instructional Design and Technology Consultant at UCLA Library, the Social Media Manager of Powell Libraryâ€™s social media channels, and one of the founders of WI+RE. Renee enjoys devising practical steps to reach theoretical ideals, and critically examining the ways we think, learn, and teach.

Featured Projects:

Start with Your Questions

This project helps learners focus their paper topics by beginning with their questions.

Find the Right Research Guide

This tutorial is designed to help you use UCLA Library's database of Research Guides, so that you can find exactly what you're looking for when you're researching.
